body.p: However, in some cases, that information is more relevant, or results in a more faithful representation of both the entity’s financial position and its financial performance, through the use of:

a different measurement basis for the related income and expenses in the statement of profit or loss (see paragraphs 7.17–7.18).

body.p: In selecting those measurement bases, it is necessary to consider the factors discussed in paragraphs 6.43–6.76.
